titles: A disclosing of the great bull and certain calues that he hath gotten, and specially the monster bull that roared at my Lord Byshops gate.
author: Norton, Thomas, 1532-1584.
publisher: By Iohn Daye dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
notes: "An addition declaratorie to the bulles, with a searching of the maze" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are separate.
